title: Phase 2.4: FAT32 Long Filename Support
description: Enable user-friendly long filenames for Westminster chimes. Replaces cryptic 8.3 DOS format (WESTMI~1) with readable names (WESTMINSTER). BREAKING CHANGE: Requires SD card reorganization with new long filenames.
changes: Enable FAT32 Long Filename (LFN) support with UTF-8 encoding
Replace 8.3 filenames: WESTMI~1 → WESTMINSTER, QUARTE~1.PCM → QUARTER_PAST.PCM
UTF-8 encoding for German characters (ü,ä,ö,ß) and multi-language support
PSRAM-optimized buffer allocation (saves 1.5 KB internal DRAM)
Binary size: 1.27 MB (49% partition space free)
BREAKING CHANGE: SD card directory structure updated - requires reorganization
breaking_changes: SD card must be reorganized with long filenames
migration_notes: 4. Copy files with new long filenames:
